sentences.en: "The dif-ference is," he said portentously, "you are Anglo-Saxons, we are Latins."
sentences.cn: 他拿腔拿调地说道：“区别在于你们是盎格鲁—撒克逊人，我们是拉丁人。”

sentences.en: Anglo - American markets will be worst affected by the credIt'squeeze.
sentences.cn: 信贷市场将对英美市场造成的影响最为严重.

sentences.en: Anglo - Saxon is the forerunner of modern English.
sentences.cn: 盎 格鲁撒 克逊语是现代英语的先驱.

sentences.en: Anglo - Saxon was an inflective language; there was lack of prepositions and articles.
sentences.cn: 古英语是屈折变化的语言, 缺少介词和冠词.

sentences.en: Debilly had no Anglo-Saxon shyness about discussing money.
sentences.cn: 在谈到钱时，德比利毫无英国式的羞涩。

sentences.en: Ex-cavations have revealed Roman and Anglo-Saxon remains in the area.
sentences.cn: 挖掘工作已显示在该地区有罗马和盎格鲁-撒克逊时代的遗迹。

sentences.en: He was born of Anglo-American parentage.
I made a crude summary of Anglo - American attitudes.
sentences.cn: 我扼要地谈了一下英美的态度.

sentences.en: Modern English derives primarily from one of the dialects of Anglo - Saxon.
sentences.cn: 现代英语起源于盎格鲁 - 撒克逊语的多种方言之一.

sentences.en: Rights of common go back to Anglo - Saxon times.
sentences.cn: 公地使用权可以追溯到盎格鲁 - 撒克逊时代.

sentences.en: That embodies the Anglo - Saxon world s attitude to home ownership.
sentences.cn: 这体现了盎格鲁撒克逊时期对自有住宅的看法.

sentences.en: the Anglo-French consortium that built the Channel Tunnel
sentences.cn: 修建英吉利海峡隧道的英法财团

sentences.en: The difference is, you are Anglo-Saxons, we are Latins.
sentences.cn: 差异在于，你们是英国血统，而我们是拉丁裔的。

sentences.en: The dismal English effort in the third Anglo - Dutch conflict of 1672 - 1674 requires minimal space here.
sentences.cn: 但是英国在1672 - 1674年第三次英荷战争中表现消沉,在此毋需赘述.

sentences.en: Unfortunately, an alternative version was developed at the Anglo - European Chiropractic College.
sentences.cn: 不幸的是, Anglo-EuropeanChiropractic学院编制了一种替代版本.

trans.tran_en: a White inhabitant of the United States who is not of Latin extraction
